item.title: Lobster bisque
item.description: Creamy french lobster soup perfect for the holidays, you can optionally replace the lobster with any other shellfish. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 20 üç≥Cook time: 30 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 2 litres Ingredients 1 live lobster that weighs ~750 grams 2 onions 2 carrots 1 shallot 2 garlic cloves cognac 3 tbsp concentrated tomato puree 4 tomatoes 3 tbsp flour 1 glass dry white wine 2 litres fish stock 1 bayleaf 2 twigs of thyme fresh parsley heavy cream canola oil 2 tbsp butter Directions Finely dice the onions, carrots, shallots and garlic and set aside for later.
